name: Cutthroat Cannoneers
description:
Ludum Dare 51 Compo Submission. This is my third ever Jam.

Controls: use 'A' and 'D' to move, 'Space' to jump, and 'S' to fall through certain platforms

All art and assets and my own

Sound effects generated using https://sfxr.me/

Background music made using https://www.beepbox.co/

Art made using www.piskelapp.com
